description.value:
Your study of combat allows you to learn spells that increase your combat ability. You can prepare these spells when you are the appropriate bard level.

Spell LevelSpells
1st@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.YW2Wley1UBAMqh9B]{Compelled Duel}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.z1mx84ONwkXKUZd7]{Shield}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.uqryjG0UwOSWuRLW]{Blur}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.dUFB8zgpjBTJIZkc]{Magic Weapon}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.d9hL2WW6P8aomrgq]{Conjure Barrage}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Szvk5FEVQW3uhJi5]{Haste}
4th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.VtCXMdyM6mAdIJZb]{Death Ward}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.avD5XUtkBPQQR97c]{Fire Shield}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.laSV4WVFSDon9dmq]{Destructive Wave}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.rXGzAcIDebMCO02x]{Swift Quiver}
